name: Rolly Splat
description:
Run fast with Rolly Splat and avoid the obstacles in this fun and extreme endless game!


You have been chosen. You must Run behind bomb . Dodge left and right to avoid the Bomb.
Hexavoid Features:

• Cool graphics and sound effects.
• World with 200 unique levels.
• Turbo, bombs, shooting and invincibility power-ups for max scoring potential.

How to Play:

Touch anywhere on the screen and drag left or right to move your charachter , avoid the obstacles,.
